meanings.definition: The act of throwing a javelin.
meanings.sent1: During the competition, his javelining was impressive.
meanings.sent2: She practiced javelining every afternoon at the field.
meanings.sent3: The clown attempted javelining with rubber javelins, causing laughter in the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in javelining was like a sharpshooter aiming for a target.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the javelin soaring through the air during javelining echoed across the stadium.

meanings.sent1: Javelining requires strength and technique to excel in the sport.
meanings.sent2: Fans gathered to watch the exciting javelining competition.
meanings.sent3: In the world of unusual sports, javelining stood out as a unique choice.
meanings.sent4: The intensity of the javelining match was like a fierce battle between athletes.
meanings.sent5: The thrill of victory in javelining is unmatched by any other sport.

meanings.definition: A technique used in javelin throwing.
meanings.sent1: His coach taught him the proper javelining technique for better throws.
meanings.sent2: Mastering the javelining technique takes practice and dedication.
meanings.sent3: The secret to successful javelining lies in the precise execution of the technique.
meanings.sent4: Her unique javelining technique set her apart from other competitors.
meanings.sent5: The fluidity of his javelining technique was like a graceful dance on the field.
